Detailed Description

A validator for QRect values.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum TValueValidator::EValidateResult [inherited]

Enumerator:
VR_BAD  means that validation has failed.
VR_OK  means that validation has passed.
VR_FIXED  means that validated value has corrected automatically during validation.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

int  wmin = INT_MIN,
int  wmax = INT_MAX,
int  hmin = INT_MIN,
int  hmax = INT_MAX 
)

Parameters:
wmin is the minimum allowed width value, INT_MIN by default.
wmax is the maximum allowed width value, INT_MAX by default.
hmin is the minimum allowed height value, INT_MIN by default.
hmax is the maximum allowed height value, INT_MAX by default.

Member Function Documentation

virtual EValidateResult TRectValidator::checkValue ( QVariant &  value  )  [virtual]

This method checks input (normally passed from item editor) and returns a result of the validation (see EValidateResult enum).

If the validator can fix invalid value, it should write correct value back to and return VR_FIXED. If the value can not be fixed, it should return VR_BAD. If the value is good, it should return VR_OK respectively.

Reimplemented from TSizeValidator.
